Package eu.mihosoft.freerouting.geometry.planar

Class Point

java.lang.Object
eu.mihosoft.freerouting.geometry.planar.Point
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
IntPoint, RationalPoint
public abstract class Point extends Object implements Serializable
Abstract class describing functionality for Points in the plane.
See Also:

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    abstract int
    compare_x(Point p_other)
    Returns 1, if this Point has a strict bigger x coordinate than p_other, 0, if the x cooordinates are equal, and -1 otherwise.
    int
    compare_x_y(Point p_other)
    The function returns compare_x (p_other), if the result is not 0.
    abstract int
    compare_y(Point p_other)
    Returns 1, if this Point has a strict bigger y coordinate than p_other, 0, if the y cooordinates are equal, and -1 otherwise.
    abstract Vector
    difference_by(Point p_other)
    returns the difference vector of this point and p_other
    static Point
    get_instance(int p_x, int p_y)
    creates an IntPoint from p_x and p_y.
    static Point
    get_instance(BigInteger p_x, BigInteger p_y, BigInteger p_z)
    factory method for creating a Point from 3 BigIntegers
    abstract boolean
    is_contained_in(IntBox p_box)
    Returns true, if this point lies in the interiour or on the border of p_box.
    abstract boolean
    is_infinite()
    returns true, if this Point is a RationalPoint with denominator z = 0.
    Point
    mirror_horizontal(Point p_pole)
    Mirrors this point at the horizontal line through p_pole.
    Point
    mirror_vertical(Point p_pole)
    Mirrors this point at the vertical line through p_pole.
    Direction
    perpendicular_direction(Line p_line)
    Calculates the perpendicular direction froma this point to p_line.
    abstract Point
    perpendicular_projection(Line p_line)
    returns the nearest point to this point on p_line
    abstract Side
    side_of(Line p_line)
     
    Side
    side_of(Point p_1, Point p_2)
    The function returns Side.ON_THE_LEFT, if this Point is on the left of the line from p_1 to p_2; Side.ON_THE_RIGHT, if this Point is on the right of the line from p_1 to p_2; and Side.COLLINEAR, if this Point is collinear with p_1 and p_2.
    abstract IntBox
    surrounding_box()
    creates the smallest Box with integer coordinates containing this point.
    abstract IntOctagon
    surrounding_octagon()
    creates the smallest Octagon with integer coordinates containing this point.
    abstract FloatPoint
    to_float()
    approximates the coordinates of this point by float coordinates
    abstract Point
    translate_by(Vector p_vector)
    returns the translation of this point by p_vector
    Point
    turn_90_degree(int p_factor, Point p_pole)
    Turns this point by p_factor times 90 degree around p_pole.

    • translate_by

      public abstract Point translate_by(Vector p_vector)
      returns the translation of this point by p_vector

    • difference_by

      public abstract Vector difference_by(Point p_other)
      returns the difference vector of this point and p_other

    • to_float

      public abstract FloatPoint to_float()
      approximates the coordinates of this point by float coordinates

    • is_infinite

      public abstract boolean is_infinite()
      returns true, if this Point is a RationalPoint with denominator z = 0.

    • surrounding_box

      public abstract IntBox surrounding_box()
      creates the smallest Box with integer coordinates containing this point.

    • surrounding_octagon

      public abstract IntOctagon surrounding_octagon()
      creates the smallest Octagon with integer coordinates containing this point.

    • is_contained_in

      public abstract boolean is_contained_in(IntBox p_box)
      Returns true, if this point lies in the interiour or on the border of p_box.

    • side_of

      public abstract Side side_of(Line p_line)

    • perpendicular_projection

      public abstract Point perpendicular_projection(Line p_line)
      returns the nearest point to this point on p_line

    • get_instance

      public static Point get_instance(int p_x, int p_y)
      creates an IntPoint from p_x and p_y. If p_x or p_y is to big for an IntPoint, a RationalPoint is created.

    • get_instance

      public static Point get_instance(BigInteger p_x, BigInteger p_y, BigInteger p_z)
      factory method for creating a Point from 3 BigIntegers

    • side_of

      public Side side_of(Point p_1, Point p_2)
      The function returns Side.ON_THE_LEFT, if this Point is on the left of the line from p_1 to p_2; Side.ON_THE_RIGHT, if this Point is on the right of the line from p_1 to p_2; and Side.COLLINEAR, if this Point is collinear with p_1 and p_2.

    • perpendicular_direction

      public Direction perpendicular_direction(Line p_line)
      Calculates the perpendicular direction froma this point to p_line. Returns Direction.NULL, if this point lies on p_line.

    • compare_x

      public abstract int compare_x(Point p_other)
      Returns 1, if this Point has a strict bigger x coordinate than p_other, 0, if the x cooordinates are equal, and -1 otherwise.

    • compare_y

      public abstract int compare_y(Point p_other)
      Returns 1, if this Point has a strict bigger y coordinate than p_other, 0, if the y cooordinates are equal, and -1 otherwise.

    • compare_x_y

      public int compare_x_y(Point p_other)
      The function returns compare_x (p_other), if the result is not 0. Otherwise it returns compare_y (p_other).

    • turn_90_degree

      public Point turn_90_degree(int p_factor, Point p_pole)
      Turns this point by p_factor times 90 degree around p_pole.

    • mirror_vertical

      public Point mirror_vertical(Point p_pole)
      Mirrors this point at the vertical line through p_pole.

    • mirror_horizontal

      public Point mirror_horizontal(Point p_pole)
      Mirrors this point at the horizontal line through p_pole.
